resp = client.indices.analyze(
    tokenizer="standard",
    filter=[
        {
            "type": "keep_types",
            "types": [
                "<NUM>"
            ],
            "mode": "exclude"
        }
    ],
    text="1 quick fox 2 lazy dogs",
)
print(resp)
